  • Classes in com.stormpath.sdk.account used by com.stormpath.sdk.account 
    Class and Description
    Account
    An Account is a unique identity within a Directory.
    AccountCriteria
    An Account-specific Criteria class, enabling an Account-specific fluentquery DSL.
    AccountOptions
    Account-specific options that may be specified when retrieving Account resources.
    AccountStatus
    An AccountStatus represents the various states an account may be in.
    CreateAccountRequest
    Represents an attempt to create a new Account record in Stormpath.
    CreateAccountRequestBuilder
    A Builder to construct CreateAccountRequests.
    EmailVerificationToken 
    PasswordFormat
    A PasswordFormat represents the various formats supported for Password Import Read more info about the supported formats here
    VerificationEmailRequest
    The VerificationEmailRequest is used in scenarios where the Account Registration and Verification workflow is enabled.
    VerificationEmailRequestBuilder
    A Builder to construct VerificationEmailRequests.
